bill_title: require the governing body of a school district to approve the formation of a tax incremental finance district, to require a publication of the decision to create a tax incremental finance district, and to allow the voters of a school district affected by the decision to refer the decision.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the governing body of a school district to approve the formation of a tax incremental finance district, to require a publication of the decision to create a tax incremental finance district, and to allow the voters of a school district affected by the decision to refer the decision. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 11-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Before any governing body may create a tax incremental finance district pursuant to chapter 11-9, a resolution shall be approved by an affirmative two-thirds vote of the governing body of the school district affected by the creation of the proposed tax incremental finance district. Section 2. That chapter 11-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The decision of the governing body to create a tax incremental finance district shall be published within ten days of the decision. Section 3. That chapter 11-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The decision of the governing body to create a tax incremental finance district may be referred upon a petition signed by at least five percent of the registered voters in the affected school district, if the petition is filed with the respective governing body within thirty days of the publication required by section 2 of this Act. The referendum election shall be held within sixty days from the date the petitions are submitted.
